title: Good Indie games.
body:
Its my birthday tomorow so I wanna stack up a list of good indie games.
I already have a a few, like Mark Of The Ninja - LIMBO - Bastion - Dust: An Elysian tale.

But what are good indie games that you guys recommend?

replies.body: Risk of Rain, best game by far

There's a whole bunch people consider modern classics and what not. 

FEZ (pretty and great music), Braid (challenging), Magicka (best with friends), Antichamber (if you want to get confused). 

There's heaps out there!
